{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Xiaomi |model=MiWiFi 3 |revision=HD (R3D) |series=AC2300 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |fcc_date=12/13/2017 |fcc_id=2AIMRMIWIFIR3D |pcb_id=Р29908 |type=wireless router, NAS |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8064 |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30UF2G18AC-TI |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646F-BYMA |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, SATA 3.1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |expansion_sata_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pad header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9980 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9984 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=3 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Thermo Sensor;TI;TMP75;;1;,,, Fan Controller;SMSC;EMC2301;;1; |flags=int. HDD (1TB), fan |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;3.4.103; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=Xiaomi_XXXX, Xiaomi_XXXX_5G |default_ssid_regex=^Xiaomi_[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.31.1 |oui=40:31:3C |oui_eth=40:31:3C }} {{TagLine|Xiaomi MiWiFi HD (R3D)}} :[http://www.mi.com/miwifihd/ Product page] (CN)
